Title: Relates to excise tax on telecommunication services
Summary: Relates to excise tax on telecommunication services (Part A); relates to temporary municipal assistance sales and compensating use taxes for cities of one million or more on telecommunication services (Part B).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to excise tax on telecommunications services (Part A); and to amend the tax law, in relation to temporary municipal assistance sales and compensating use taxes for cities of one million or more on telecommunications services (Part B)
